summary: If you need small cameras, you have to typically settle for picture quality that LOOKS like it came from a tourist gadget.Not this one!
This is my first digital camera and while I was camera searching there are two very important things that you have to take into consideration.
I do not enjoy carrying the larger movie cameras and this is just right for me.
I would either purchase a set of rechargable batteries or try another camera.The pictures that we have taken do turn out very well.
Try experimenting with the features to find something that suits you.For the money, its a great camera, but dont expect miracles out of it.
This is a pretty nice drive for the price and if you have other applications it should work just fine.
This burner took me a little getting used to, but now that I am, it works just great, with minimal sound when compared to other burners.
The stand is sturdy and can keep your drive vertically without any risk of falling.But after I bought this, I plugged it into my computer.
I so far like the drive, my major complaint is the Nero software that came with it, I've had nothing but aggravation with it!
I just got this burner today, and I just wanted to write a review about how pleasantly surprised I was with it.
